fileUrl.title: File URL
fileUrl.description: URL of the archive file to download and extract (supports .zip, .tar, .tar.gz, .tgz, .tar.bz2, .tbz2, .7z)

folderPath.title: Output Folder Path
folderPath.description: Path where extracted files will be saved (default: ./storage/extracted)

maxFileSizeMb.title: Max File Size (MB)
maxFileSizeMb.description: Maximum file size in megabytes to process

fileNamePrefix.title: File Name Prefix
fileNamePrefix.description: Optional prefix to add to extracted file names
